review_data.title: Guter Mexikaner
review_data.content: Waren geschäftlich hier, modernes Konzept und gutes Essen! Portionsgrössen dem Preis angemessen, ich komme wieder!

review_data.title: Possibly the best Mexican food in Switzerland
review_data.content: I went here alone for a late lunch, and had a vegetarian plate - black beans, spicy rice, soft tacos, guacamole and salad. The beans were very well spiced and the sauces delicious. Service was quick (well, it is fast food) and friendly. Although this...More

review_data.title: Very Good
review_data.content: Went there for dinner and it was worth it. The restaurant is located almost at the end of tram line 2. Get off the tram, walk towards the Migros supermarket, La Taqueria is right in front across the street. The menu is not large but...More

review_data.title: Fresh and Fast
review_data.content: The food is delicious, made with fresh ingredients. Mild flavouring but they do have different salsas to spice up your food. Definitely worth a visit if you're looking for a great fast food mexican.

review_data.title: Super burritos und gute Preise

review_data.title: perfect for summer evenings!
review_data.content: Visited on a warm night in May and seated outside. We had nachos (served with guacamole and chopped tomatoes) for starters and then a burrito and two tacos. Everything was pretty good, while the chicken filling was actually very tasty!

review_data.title: Good for lunch

review_data.title: authentisch+geschmacklich sehr gut
review_data.content: schön gestaltetes Restaurant, gutes Angebot und wurde alles frisch und schnell zubereitet. service und preis leistung war super.

review_data.title: Good for lunch or dinner

review_data.title: Enjoyable lunch option

review_data.title: Delicious, fresh Mexican food
review_data.content: When I'm in the area, I go out of my way to have lunch here, delicious, fresh Mexican food fast - something that is pretty hard to find in this part of the world. Good value; not cheap, but then nothing is in CH.

review_data.title: Awesome mexican food in Zurich
review_data.content: Very simple but solid menu offering a good taste of the most typical and important tastes of mexico with a touch of TexMex. The taste has been adapted to Switzerland by a minimum, mainly how hot the food and the sauces are, but the food...More

review_data.title: Burittos with no rice.. yay
review_data.content: Yummy charbroiled flank steak with add-ons cheese, sour cream, guacamole etc .. tasty 100% mango drink.

review_data.title: Good mexican food and nice place
review_data.content: If you like mexican food you're going to enjoy this place. We had 3 dishes (nachos, burrito with meat and quesadillas) and all of them were fresh, well cooked and tasty. Abundant portions as well. The place is not huge, so probably on crowded evenings...More

review_data.title: Good one
review_data.content: Good and tasty Mexican food. We went there with 14 colleagues (reservation was required). The food came quite fast and was delicious. Restaurant has veggie options too.

review_data.title: Finally real Mexican food in Zurich!
review_data.content: Great tacos, all the right fixings, and an atmosphere that transports you far away from Switzerland. I only wish they were open on Sunday!

review_data.title: not bad

review_data.title: Mmmmhh sehr zu empfehlen!

review_data.title: Good Mexican food found in Switzerland!

review_data.title: Authentic economical Mexican food in Zurich
review_data.content: We were staying in an apartment just around the corner, and visited La Taqueria for that reason. Ordered tacos, rice and beans (billed separately, but the meal was economical by Zurich standards). Simple fare, but as good as Mexican family resturants in Tucson. We returned...More

review_data.title: Mexican food in Zurich!!
review_data.content: Super exciting to finally have an authentic Mexican restaurant in Zurich, because what they serve at Desperado or Mexikano is not Mexican food, but rather what Europeans think Mexican food should be.

review_data.title: It's fresh and mexican for a good price
review_data.content: We today visited "La Taqueria" for lunch, and were surprised about the freshness and quality of the food. This restaurant is perfect for lunch, it's fresh, delicious, fast and not that expensive as others. Like it and will definitely come back :-)

review_data.title: Sehr gutes Essen und grosse Portionen!

review_data.title: Yummy SF-style Burritos

review_data.title: Another Mexican let down in Zurich
